name: Robert W. Ripley and Associates Reviews

review.employee-type: Legal Assistant Worker's Comp Law (Former Employee)
review.title: “My job as a Legal Assistant”
review.pros: Pros – It was my dream job working in an office at a job I had become very familiar with. I started the filing system based on former experience with another attorney. I felt welcome and at ease with everyone there.
review.cons: Cons – The only con was that I had to give up the job because of ill health at the time and my wife's illness as well. I had to remain home and care for her. Otherwise my time at the office of Robert W. Riply and Associates was great and he was a great employer to work for.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – As an employer I can only say that they should keep up the good work for their clients and employees. My time at this job ended in 2004 and not 2008.
